description: The work covered under this contract...
full_summary:
=================
### Floating Wharves Construction and Installation Solicitation
#### PW-22-01005247 - Invitation to Qualify
================================================================

**Project Description:**
This solicitation is for a two-phase selection process for the construction and installation of floating wharves at Pleasant Bay, Inverness County, Nova Scotia. Bidders must demonstrate their qualifications in Phase One, following which, select bidders will be invited to submit a financial bid in Phase Two.

**Key Dates:**

* Publication Date: August 24, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: September 8, 2022, 13:00 hour
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

**Contract Details:**

* Contracting Entity: *Fisheries and Oceans Canada*
* Location: *Pleasant Bay, Inverness County, Nova Scotia*
* Category: Construction Services (Specified by CNST)
* Trade Agreements: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*
* Regions of Opportunity: *Nova Scotia*
* Regions of Delivery: *Nova Scotia*

**Bidder Information:**
Bidders are required to contact Kimberly Walker, the designated Contracting Authority, through email at *DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca*. 

**Document Access:**
The Request for Qualification (RFQ) documents can be obtained from the CanadaBuys website at the following links:

* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/24/0195e947d5c303cb56419a1871a9abcc/30003306_-_request_for_qualification_-_floating_wharves_pleasant_bay_ns_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/24/0195e947d5c303cb56419a1871a9abcc/30003306_-_request_for_qualification_-_floating_wharves_pleasant_bay_ns_en.pdf)
* French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/24/c8e0a32a399d8cb4339f5c114c49a5bf/30003306_-_request_for_qualification_-_floating_wharves_pleasant_bay_ns_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/
